title: Generate and integrate a full-screen animated neon cover image for the game start screen

requirements.text: Generate a new hyperreal modern-cartoon, cinematic neon cover image matching the user’s provided scene description (colossal neon green/purple snake biting a splitting silver UFO with a screaming green alien inside; smaller snakes stampeding in the foreground with glowing trails; a flying cow on the right shooting red laser beams with smoke; rotating starfield background; sparks/fire/color explosions; volumetric lighting; depth of field; long shadows). Save it as a static asset in the frontend public generated assets folder.

quotes: Portada hiperrealista en estilo caricatura moderna, ultra detallada, con render cinematográfico... Resolución 8K, ultra cinematográfica.
que la imagine cubra toda la pantalla, que se mueva y brille con colores neon  y que remplace la imagen que ya esta

acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/game-cover-neon-snake-ufo.dim_3840x2160.png.

The image visually includes all key elements described by the user (snake + UFO split + alien, foreground smaller snakes with trails, flying cow with red lasers + smoke, rotating starfield feel, sparks/fire/explosive color, cinematic lighting/DOF).
The asset is referenced via a plain static URL path starting with /assets/generated/ (no backend image serving).

requirements.text: Replace the current start/cover artwork with the new cover image and present it as a full-screen start overlay on the Play page. The cover must fill the viewport (cover sizing), and include a subtle animated neon glow + motion treatment (e.g., slow parallax drift/zoom, hue-shift shimmer, and/or animated light sweep) while keeping UI readable and clickable.

quotes: que la imagine cubra toda la pantalla, que se mueva y brille con colores neon  y que remplace la imagen que ya esta

acceptanceCriteria: On /play when the game has not started yet, the user sees a full-viewport cover background using /assets/generated/game-cover-neon-snake-ufo.dim_3840x2160.png.
The cover is animated (visible motion over time) and has a neon glow/shimmer effect; animation does not block button interactions.
Existing start UI (title/description/start button) remains readable on top of the cover via an overlay/gradient/backdrop treatment.
The previous start/cover background used in this state is no longer visible.

requirements.text: Update the Home page hero artwork to use the new cover image instead of the current generated hero image, keeping responsive layout intact.

quotes: que ... remplace la imagen que ya esta

acceptanceCriteria: The Home page hero image displays /assets/generated/game-cover-neon-snake-ufo.dim_3840x2160.png and remains properly styled (no layout break on desktop).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only shadcn components).
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Do not route generated images through the backend; serve them as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated.
nonGoals: Do not change gameplay mechanics, scoring, spawning, or physics.
Do not add new authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
Do not implement real-time networking changes (WebSockets, etc.).

required: Hyperreal modern-cartoon cinematic neon cover art featuring: colossal neon green/purple snake biting a splitting silver UFO with a screaming green alien inside; foreground stampede of smaller snakes with glowing trails; flying cow with red laser eyes and smoky beams; rotating starfield; sparks/fire/explosive colors; volumetric lighting; depth of field; long shadows (game-cover-neon-snake-ufo.dim_3840x2160.png)

preferencesToAdd: Use English for user-facing text in the app.
